short_summary: INVITATION TO SUBMIT A BID FOR INSPECTION & MAINTENANCE OF GENERATOR SETS AT IML INSTITUTE OF MONT-JOLI
description: INSPECTION & MAINTENANCE OF GENERATOR SETS AT IML OF MONT-JOLI,QUÉBEC

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) calls for bids on the contract titled: EE517-232303 – Inspection and Maintenance of Generator Sets Services.

#### Issuing Authority
The contract is being issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and is located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

#### Document Information
**Document Reference**: WS4104795120-Doc4156921827
**Date of Publication**: August 24, 2023
**Amendment Number**: 1 (Details of amendments: None)
**Publication Date of Amendment**: September 15, 2023
**Contract Duration**: The anticipated start date for the contract is October 1, 2023, with an expected end date of September 30, 2025.

#### Tender Information
**Contract Status**: Expired
**Procurement Method**: Competitive-Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Solicitation Details
The notice is requesting proposals for inspection and maintenance services of generator sets at Institut Maurice-Lamontage (IML) in Mont-Joli, Quebec. 

#### Contact Information
For further information, interested contractors may contact: Pichette, Veronique Hae Ok
Email: [veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Additional Resources
Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17260114?extsite=MTcyNjAxMTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Tender Notice URL in French
Avis de soumission du même notice est accessible en français à l'adresse ci-dessous : https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17260114?extsite=MTcyNjAxMTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Important References
- The solicitation and all its annexes are available on the Vendor Interface for Public Works and Government Services Canada website.
- Bids must only be submitted by the established closing date and time as stated in the tender documentation.
